TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCookieCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class HttpCookieCollection Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 提供類型安全的方式來操作 HTTP Cookie。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to manipulate HTTP cookies.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取使用 cookie屬性物件並寫入使用 cookie屬性物件。The following code example demonstrates how to read cookies using the property of the object and write cookies using the property of the object. 這兩個屬性會傳回物件。Both properties return objects. 如果兩個 cookie 其中一項名為`userName`和`lastVisit`不在 HTTP 要求，則它們會建立 HTTP 回應中。If either of two cookies named `userName` and `lastVisit` are not in the HTTP request, then they are created in the HTTP response. 如果存在兩個 cookie，則會顯示的 cookie 內容。If the two cookies exist, the properties of the cookies are displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCookieCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookieCollection/cs/HttpCookieCollection.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCookieCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookieCollection/vb/HttpCookieCollection.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 包含兩個內建 cookie 集合。ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections. 集合可透過存取包含用戶端中的伺服器傳送的 cookie`Cookie`標頭。The collection accessible through contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header. 集合可透過存取包含在伺服器上產生並傳輸至用戶端中的 cookie`Set-Cookie`標頭。The collection accessible through contains cookies generated on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新的 cookie 集合物件，並填入接收自用戶端的 cookie。The following example creates a new cookie collection object and fills it with the cookies received from the client. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.Web.HttpCookie cookie) cil managed

span.span: The to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將指定的 Cookie 加入 Cookie 集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified cookie to the cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何數目的 cookie 集合可存在於某個應用程式，但只能參考內建的集合中物件傳送至用戶端。Any number of cookie collections can exist within an application, but only the collection referenced by the intrinsic object is sent to the client. 方法允許重複的 cookie 的 cookie 集合中。The method allows duplicate cookies in the cookie collection. 使用方法，以確保唯一性的 cookie 集合中的 cookie。Use the method to ensure the uniqueness of cookies in the cookie collection. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新的 cookie 集合與新的 cookie，名為"LastVisit 」、 設定 cookie 的值為目前的日期和時間，和將 cookie 加入至新的集合。The following example creates a new cookie collection and a new cookie named "LastVisit", sets the value of the cookie to the current date and time, and adds the cookie to the new collection. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得包含 Cookie 集合中所有索引鍵 (Cookie 名稱) 的字串陣列。

span.span: Gets a string array containing all the keys (cookie names) in the cookie collection.
An array of cookie names.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立字串陣列，包含用戶端的 cookie 集合中的 cookie 的名稱。The following example creates a string array containing the names of the cookies in a client's cookie collection. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 從 Cookie 集合清除所有 Cookie。

span.span: Clears all cookies from the cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會刪除所有 cookie 的 cookie 集合。The following example deletes all cookies from a cookie collection. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會將 cookie 整個集合複製到新的陣列物件。The following example copies the entire cookie collection into a new Array object. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns an individual object from the cookie collection.

summary.span: 這個屬性被多載，以允許用名稱或數值索引來擷取 Cookie。

span.span: This property is overloaded to allow retrieval of cookies by either name or numerical index.

param.name: index

span.span: Returns the item with the specified index from the cookie collection.
The specified by .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例傳回的 cookie 集合中的每個 cookie、 檢查是否會命名為"LastVisit 」，並，如果找到 「 LastVisit"，更新其值為目前的日期和時間。The following example returns each cookie from the cookie collection, checks whether it is named "LastVisit", and, if "LastVisit" is found, updates its value to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: name
param.span: 要從集合中擷取的 Cookie 名稱。

span.span: The name of the cookie to retrieve from the collection.

summary.span: 從 Cookie 集合傳回指定之名稱的 Cookie。

span.span: Returns the cookie with the specified name from the cookie collection.
The specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具名的 cookie 不存在，則這個方法會具有該名稱建立新的 cookie。If the named cookie does not exist, this method creates a new cookie with that name. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取到新的 cookie 集合用戶端傳送的 cookie 集合、 擷取新的集合，從名為"LastVisit"的 cookie 和更新的 cookie 值為目前的日期和時間。The following example captures the cookie collection sent by the client into a new cookie collection, retrieves the cookie named "LastVisit" from the new collection, and updates the cookie's value to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的 cookie`name`不存在集合中沒有擲回例外狀況。If a cookie with the specified `name` does not exist in the collection, no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會從集合移除 cookie。The following example removes a cookie from the collection. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Set(class System.Web.HttpCookie cookie) cil managed

span.span: The object to update.

summary.span: 更新 Cookie 集合中現有的 Cookie 值。

span.span: Updates the value of an existing cookie in a cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會先檢查以查看 cookie 已存在於集合中，如果是的話，會更新它。The method first checks to see if a cookie already exists in the collection and if so updates it. 方法不允許重複的 cookie 的 cookie 集合中。The method does not allow duplicate cookies in the cookie collection. 若要新增重複的 cookie 的 cookie 集合中，使用方法。To add duplicate cookies in the cookie collection, use the method. ## Examples 下列範例會更新現有的 cookie 的值。The following example updates the value of an existing cookie. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
